alert.note: Alert for Madison; Platte; Stanton (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 11 at 11:17PM CDT until October 12 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Madison County in northeastern Nebraska... Northeastern Platte County in northeastern Nebraska... Southwestern Stanton County in northeastern Nebraska... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1117 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles southwest of Humphrey, or 17 miles northwest of Columbus, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Madison, Humphrey, Platte Center, Creston, Lakeview, Tarnov, Cornlea, Shell Creek Elementary School, Lake North, and Lake Babcock. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
